statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT customer_id, name, interests FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, purchase_history FROM customer_profiles WHERE interests LIKE '%Music%';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, interests FROM customer_profiles WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, purchase_history->'items' AS items FROM customer_profiles WHERE JSON_LENGTH(purchase_history->'items') > 5;
SELECT COUNT(*), MAX(age), MIN(age) FROM customer_profiles WHERE interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, customer_interests FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location, customer_age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_interests LIKE '%music%' ORDER BY customer_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE customer_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(recommendation_id) AS recommendation_count FROM ProductRecommendations GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(recommendation_score) AS total_score FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommendation_type = 'top_pick';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM customer_profiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT product_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM website_content WHERE category = 'Tech' ORDER BY content_title DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customer_profiles WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customer_profiles;
SELECT * FROM website_content WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_type, recommendation_score FROM product_recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM website_content WHERE page_id = 5;
SELECT customer_name, age, location FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location='New York';
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM WebsiteContent WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01' AND content_type='Article';
SELECT customer_id, recommendation_score FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM CustomerInterests WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT customer_name, age, gender FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT * FROM WebsiteContent WHERE content_type = 'article' ORDER BY published_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerProfiles WHERE location LIKE 'New%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT content_title, content_description FROM WebsiteContent WHERE content_type IN ('video', 'podcast') ORDER BY content_title
SELECT * FROM ProductRecommendations WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY recommendation_score DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM product_catalog WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT order_date, order_total FROM customer_orders WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT review_rating, review_comment FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 456;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_age FROM customer_profiles WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, product_category, product_price FROM product_catalog WHERE product_price < 50.00 ORDER BY product_price DESC;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date, order_total FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_orders ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_orders.customer_id WHERE order_total > 100.00 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM customer_profiles JOIN product_reviews ON customer_profiles.customer_id = product_reviews.customer_id WHERE review_rating = 5;

SELECT customer_name, content_type, content_text FROM customer_profiles JOIN personalized_content ON customer_profiles.customer_id = personalized_content.customer_id WHERE content_type = 'newsletter' AND content_date > '2022-01-01';
